name: Vong Thi Apartment
address: No.29, Lane 45 Vong Thi street, Tay Ho district, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features a terrace. The property features views of the lake and is 1 km from Phu Tay Ho. Free WiFi is featured .

A flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered. Other facilities at Vong Thi Apartment include a terrace.

Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is 1.8 km from Vong Thi Apartment, while West Lake is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 18 km from Vong Thi Apartment.
